title: Our India deal pipeline for 2024 is $5 bn, volumes have ramped up unprecedently: Jean Salata, EQT Chairman
description: Foreign investors are getting more confidence in both public market and private market investments in the country. The biggest deployer of capital in recent years in the country, EQT outpaced their global buyout PE private equity peers including Blackstone and KKR. Last calendar year alone, they invested in two deals worth $3 billion of enterprise value in India.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
